result.execSummary:
The defendant Andrew R. Knox was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Election Fraud-Falsify VoterRegistration, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 12.13(3)(g).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Andrew R. Knox in court.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  State moves to amend Ct. 1 12.13(3g) & 12.60(1)(b) - misd. election fraud.    No contest plea entered, advised of constitutional rights, plea accepted by Court.  Court finds Def. guilty.  Court imposes sentence.

Count 1:
$379.00 fine/costs, 60 days to pay or set up a payment plan.
Paperwork handed in court.
Plea/sentencing hearing on March 11, 2015 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant Andrew R. Knox in court.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant had PTC this morning with DA.  Request to resolve the matter today.  Court goes through right to an attorney.  Defendant waives counsel for today.  State gives amended charge of 12.13(3)(g).  Defendant agrees.  Court goes through amended change and then sentencing interrupted due to no booking, defendant needs to come back.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for March 11, 2015 at 01:00 pm.

Pre-trial conference on February 20, 2015 at 10:00 am.
Return date on March 11, 2015 at 01:00 pm.

Defendant Andrew R. Knox in court.  Sue Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant waives reading of complaint.  Advised rights to an attorney.  State request signature bond.  Requests Preliminary hearing; Time limits waived.  $2500.00 SIGNATURE bond set.  Special bond conditions as follows:  Booking on at 1 p.m.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for February 20, 2015 at 10:00 am.  Return date scheduled for Feb 25, 2015 at 01:00 pm.
